titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cul Add 470.1

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Department of History and Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution International 4.0 License.

note.p: Transcription of a Cambridge Manuscript of the Mishnah (CUL Add 470.1).
Transcription based on images at http://cudl.lib.cam.ac.uk/view/MS-ADD-00470-00001/1, by Melissa Peiser(BQ, BM 1 - 2), Nurit Ezer (BM 3 - 10), Atara Siegel (BB).
This transcription supercedes Camb.xml, a transcription of BM Chapter 2 from the edition of William Lowe by Ruti Eckdish.
